extension.description: Aeon Nox stands for eye candy and customization. There are many different views and options to present your media in the way you want it. The Home window is fully customizable. You can add up to nine custom main menu items, each with five custom sub-menu items. You can change the look with different styles and themes, add or remove widgets and disable menu and sub-menu items you don't use. Be sure to checkout the changelog to find everything that was added or changed!

Aeon Nox stands for eye candy and customization. There are many different views and options to present your media in the way you want it. The Home window is fully customizable. You can add up to nine custom main menu items, each with five custom sub-menu items. You can change the look with different styles and themes, add or remove widgets and disable menu and sub-menu items you don't use. Be sure to checkout the changelog to find everything that was added or changed!

AsegÃºrese de repasar el registro de cambios 'changelog' para encontrar todo lo que se ha aÃ±adido y cambiado!
